title: Comparative study of metal–organic frameworks synthesized via imide condensation and coordination assembly
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27634-27643
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05563B, Paper

Qiao Liu, Jordon S. Hilliard, Zhongzheng Cai, Casey R. Wade
Imide condensation with amine-functionalized metal clusters was used to prepare zinc benzotriazolate MOFs with a high degree of connectivity and porosity.
